commit message:
Several changes:
* Storing credentials in shared prefs.
* Full backup capabilities including initial sync and sync data reset after changing login.
* Made SmsSync activity a PreferenceActivity with the status at the top being a 'fake preference entry'.
* Added docs to SmsSyncService.


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@6 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Added templated frontend to list stored messages. Not yet fully functional.

Also did some code formatting changes.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@7 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Major change: Using Gmail IMAP as a backend now instead of the AppEngine web app.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@10 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Factored out shared pref related stuff into PrefStore.java.
* Added setting for the Gmail label (IMAP folder) assigned to uploaded SMS messages.
* Added automatic sync after SMS reception and according to a schedule (for outgoing SMS).
* Automatic sync retries a 2 times if errors occur, then stop.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@11 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Fixing bug where a sync was always run numRetries+1 times, even if successful.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@12 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Added preference to turn on/off background backup.
* Moved more stuff from SmsSyncService into PrefStore
* Removed obsolete CursorToJson.java
* Show dialog to user after entering password that offers to do an initial backup.
* Added more headers to uploaded mail message containing information from original SMS message.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@14 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Pixel perfecting.
* Store 'last sync' preference.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@15 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Making sure we're awake until we can set the running flag to false.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@16 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Using default shared prefs, hoping that the sporadic wiping of shared prefs goes away.
* Use proper plurals for the 'sync done' message.
* Store last backup time also for syncs without any items.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@17 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Removed '<' and '>' from REFERENCE_UID preference, as this presumably leads to the sporadic SharedPreferences wipe bug due to improper encoding in the preference file.
Also see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=1707.


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@18 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Patched ImapStore such that it does not fetch the server UID of appended Messages, saving one roundtrip per uploaded SMS.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@19 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

isFirstSync() changed such that a first sync without any messages stored on the device counts as sync.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@20 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Introduced a maximum number of messages backed up per sync. After a certain number of items, the device (but not the emulator) gets really slow and might crash. I'm not sure what's causing this.

The UI reports 'Successfully backed up 100 items.' when a sync finishes after the max number of messages, with the progressbar indicating that there are actually more non-backed-up items.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@21 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Added better UI for max_msg_per_sync case. Also explain to the user in the first sync dialog that backup will be split into batches.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@22 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Changing info link to wiki page.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@24 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Added menu to application with Share, Info and Update entries.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@25 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Added user preference for max_items_per_sync.
* Added 'Advanced settings' screen with label and max_items_per_sync preferences.


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@26 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Added an HTML about dialog.

Adding new logo with Gmail envelope. Google, don't sue me!

Slightly changing the wording of the 'Share' e-mail message.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@33 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Adjusted the Info link to UserGuide.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@36 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Changed 'project page' to 'User Guide' in about dialog.
* Removed obselete references to error dialog.
* Adjusted wording for general error such that it only uses 1 line.


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@38 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Uhm. Reverting offending lines. *cough* It was not meant like that. Really.

Added links to NOTICE and COPYING files in about dialog.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@41 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Setting android:versionName in AndroidManifest.xml directly
* Bumping android:versionCode to something that resembles the human readable version.


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@42 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Preserve more SMS fields in e-mail headers.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@43 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Removing obsolete AppEngine server. Backend is now Gmail.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@51 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Use global strings for 'Yes', 'No', and 'OK'.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@52 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Add possibility to cancel current ongoing backup. Fixes issue 13:
http://code.google.com/p/android-sms/issues/detail?id=13
* Bump version up to 1.1.0a1


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@53 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

* Use 'LIMIT' clause when querying the SMS store. This is not part of the official API and might break in the future. This should make SMS Backup more efficient and maybe fix issue 5.
* Keep WifiLock while doing a backup. Should fix some connection issues.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@54 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Fixing bug where we did not leave a mark at the first backup when there were no messages to backup. The following backup was then regarded as the first backup again and required the 'skip'/'backup' decision to run properly.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@55 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Remove duplicate 'SMS Backup' title bar for SDK levels >= 3.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@56 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Add 'Mark as read' feature that lets users have backed messages marked as read in Gmail.

* Add UI portion as check-box in the 'Advanced settings' section. (Issue 6)
* Add back-end support for the preference and logics.
* Update imapstore from k9mail to newer revision that properly supports the necessary IMAP flag.

Also in this revision:

* Fix crash when backing up anonymous messages with empty address. Thanks to brampton for the patch! (Issue 22)


git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@57 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Fix login error for passwords containing spaces. (Issue 17)

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@58 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Bump version to 1.1.0 / 11000. This revision marks the official version 1.1.0.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@59 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Fixing bug where the messages cursor was closed while iterating over it.

This revision also marks SMS Backup version 1.1.1.

git-svn-id: http://android-sms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@61 13e780f6-e3f2-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

read messages from gmail

this is not usable: the body returned by the gmail content provider is HTML,
plus missing headers. need to fall back to normal imap

first working version

* need ui
* thread timestamps are wrong (rethreading inserts current time)
don't update threads when no updates happened

Manifest: Setting app description, supporting small screens.
